onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: It's finally the final term at BCIT! I'm going to get my diploma after all

onStartDialogue.speaker: Bob
onStartDialogue.speech: Don't be too hasty Tony, we still have to get pass the courses

onStartDialogue.speaker: Bob
onStartDialogue.speech: It's the final term so things will be harder for sure
